title: Stay
description: Desperate to escape her chaotic family life, Shay is betwixt and between two men: one who offers her the predictable life she craves, while the other encourages the scary prospect of independence.Will she stay with the man who loves her, or go back to the man she loves? Agonized and confused, she must choose . . .Quirky, offbeat drama infused with humor, crazy family members at odds with sane ones, and irrational decisions with disasterous consequences.
author: Twila Vernon
